description: [Cinnamon Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1021) has used search order hijacking to launch [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) Beacons.(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022)

external_references.description: Counter Threat Unit Research Team . (2022, June 23). BRONZE STARLIGHT RANSOMWARE OPERATIONS USE HUI LOADER. Retrieved December 7, 2023.
external_references.source_name: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022

external_references.description: Microsoft. (2022, May 9). Ransomware as a service: Understanding the cybercrime gig economy and how to protect yourself. Retrieved March 10, 2023.
